verses.name: Acts 5:18
verses.text: And laid their hands on the apostles, and put them in the common prison.

verses.name: Acts 5:19
verses.text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors, and brought them forth, and said,

verses.name: Acts 5:20
verses.text: Go, stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life.

verses.name: Acts 5:21
verses.text: And when they heard that, they entered into the temple early in the morning, and taught. But the high priest came, and they that were with him, and called the council together, and all the senate of the children of Israel, and sent to the prison to have them brought.
